Mayor's Office
==============

[](/wp-content/uploads/2018/05/mayor.webm)

Mayor Anthony Fanucci
---------------------

Anthony R. Fanucci is serving his third term as Mayor of the City of Vineland, having been re-elected in November of 2020, and 2024. He previously served one term as City Council President and is also a former two-term member of the Vineland Board of Education. He also serves on the New Jersey Conference of Mayors Board of Directors, and the Executive Board of the New Jersey League of Municipalities.

Mr. Fanucci owns and operates A.R. Fanucci Insurance and A.R. Fanucci Real Estate. He is a member of the National Association of Insurance and Financial Advisors, the National Association of Realtors, the Cumberland County Board of Realtors, the Greater Vineland Chamber of Commerce, and a former member of the United Way Foundation Board.

![](https://www.vinelandcity.org/wp-content/uploads/2022/06/Mayor-Fanucci-5.13.22-scaled.jpg)

Mayor Fanucci has been honored in many capacities throughout his professional career. He is a Cultural Award recipient, a proud member of the St. Augustine Prep Hall Fame, and a winner of the Prep’s prestigious Gregor Mendel Award; a recipient of the Spirit of Achievement Award from the Italian Cultural Foundation of South Jersey; a recipient of the Teach Anti-Bullying Community Award; the Greater Vineland NAACP Unit 2115 Community Award; the Cumberland County Guidance Center Mental Health Distinguished Community Leader Award, and the New Jersey Chapter of the American Public Works Association 2024 Public Official Award.

Mr. Fanucci is generous with his time and talents. He volunteers as a mentor and career counselor to local students, supports local athletics through sponsorships and coaching, and is a very active alumnus of St. Augustine Prep.

### [Request A Meeting With The Mayor](https://www.vinelandcity.org/mayors-office/#)

Mayor Fanucci welcomes the opportunity to meet with citizens and business leaders. To schedule an appointment with Mayor Fanucci, please contact his Administrative Assistant, **Alena Broshchan**, at [(856) 794-4011](tel:8567944011), or [abroshchan@vinelandcity.org](mailto:abroshchan@vinelandcity.org)

### [Landis Avenue Banner Display](https://www.vinelandcity.org/mayors-office/#)

Banner displays across East and West Landis Avenue are scheduled by the Mayor’s Office. **[Click Here](https://www.vinelandcity.org/wp-content/uploads/2017/09/Steet-Banner-Regulations-Drawing.pdf)**for banner display guidelines and design specifications.

### [Proclamations and Awards](https://www.vinelandcity.org/mayors-office/#)

Proclamations may be requested for civic celebrations, non-profit organizations, and significant events with importance to the citizens of Vineland. Proclamations may represent a day, a week, or a month. The Mayor’s office reserves the right to modify or deny any proclamation request. Please complete and submit the **[Proclamation Request Form](https://www.vinelandcity.org/wp-content/uploads/2023/10/mayor-proclaimation-form-1.pdf)** at least two weeks prior to the date the document is needed.

### [City Hall Tour](https://www.vinelandcity.org/mayors-office/#)

Tours of City Hall are available for public and private school classes and local community groups. Please contact **Alena Broshchan**, at [(856) 794-4011](tel:8567944011), or [abroshchan@vinelandcity.org](mailto:abroshchan@vinelandcity.org), to schedule a day and time.
